name: McDowell Creek
description:
Introduction

Prospect - several nice waterfalls in reasonably close proximity along McDowell Creek. Easy access to all the falls by trails.

  • Majestic Falls: 40ft.
  • Crystal Falls: 20ft
  • Lower McDowell Falls: 20ft.

On a nearby tributary is the best of the bunch: Royal Terrace Falls which looks like a joy to rappel at 120ft.

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

Appears to be a high tourist area. Best not to leave anchors to prevent the curious / unprepared from trying to follow you.

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

https://www.waterfallsnorthwest.com/waterfall/Royal-Terrace-Falls-4376
